WorkItem.Summary: amr to wma using NAudio MFT

Comments.Message: NAudio does not include any AMR file support. You'd probably be best off finding a command line utility that can decode an AMR file to PCM.

Thanks for quick replay !!
I am hardly finding any code to decode amr file format. Do you know any 3rd party tool or C# wrapper to decode amr file?
afraid not. You coud try SOX
